job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><u>Responsibilities:</u></strong></p><ul><li>Develop high-level solution architectures and work with our offshore team of big-data engineers and decision science analysts to build, test and assess models that predict and optimize business outcomes based on a client’s success criteria </li><li>Create sophisticated yet simple interpretations and communicate insights to clients that lead to quantifiable business impact </li><li>Build relationships with clients by understanding their stated, but more importantly, latent needs </li><li>Work closely with offshore delivery managers to ensure a seamless communication and delivery </li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>The ideal candidate should have: </u></strong></p><ul><li>Strong programming skills in any one or more programming languages like Python and C/C++ </li><li>Sound fundamentals of data structures, algorithms and object-oriented programming </li><li><strong>Hands-on experience with any one popular deep learning framework like TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc. </strong></li><li>Experience in implementing <strong>Deep Learning Solutions (Computer Vision, NLP etc.) </strong></li><li>Ability to quickly learn and communicate the latest findings in AI research </li><li>Creative thinking for leveraging machine learning to build end-to-end intelligent software systems </li><li>A pleasantly forceful personality and charismatic communication style </li><li>Someone who will raise the average effectiveness of the team and has demonstrated exceptional abilities in some area of their life. In short, we are looking for a “Difference Maker”&nbsp;</li></ul>
